subtitleNullable: Includes Herbal Product Sales of a E-Commerce Company
descriptionNullable:
Quick Note: In my Notebook, I translated it from Turkish to English via Google Translate Library of Python. You can see how it has done.

This dataset is an e-commerce company's sales data in Turkey which provides herbal products in 2012,2013 years.  

It has a date(of 2012-2013 years), sex, city, product category,MontH, season(4 season)), region(7 regions) features in Turkish. You should process the data to your languages easily by just making the translation of some categorical data. In Turkey here is 7 region which has a different culture and geographical structure.

Free to use. I do not know about licenses. If you have information about licenses, you can inform me about that.


I have some questions:

0-) Is it possible to know which category of product will be bought by a customer in a season, a region, or sex ? many questions can be asked.
1-) How to do exploratory data analysis with this data?
2-) What kind of visualization tool components should be used for best practice?
3-) How this data can be or should be expanded?
4-) Which questions are should I ask for this dataset?
